title: Comedian Micah 'Bam Bamm' White
description:
Micah 'Bam Bamm' White is a hilarious stand up comedian from Virginia. He was one of our earliest guests on the podcast, back in 2012. Topics include One Take cars, stand up comedy, and "rich white people shit".  

https://www.mbbwhite.com/

This show is also available as a video, full of pictures, videos, and other assets pertaining to the conversation. ! https://youtu.be/e1eWNniQVGA

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @comedianbamm
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
